name: tripo-3d-generation
description: Turn text or images into production-ready 3D models with sculpture-level geometry and sharp edges. Powered by Tripo AI — supports text-to-3D, image-to-3D, auto-rigging, skeletal animation (walk/run/jump/attack), stylization (LEGO/Voxel/Voronoi/Minecraft), format conversion, and PBR materials. 10 free credits, no API key required.
author: tripo-team

TRIPO_API_KEY.description: Your Tripo API key (starts with tsk_). Optional — 10 free credits are available without a key. Get yours at https://platform.tripo3d.ai/api-keys

action.description: The action to perform. Core: generate/status/download/credits. Animation: prerigcheck→rig→animate. Post-processing: stylize/convert/texture/refine.

prompt.description: Text description for 3D model generation. Used with action='generate' when no image_url is provided. Example: 'a futuristic robot with glowing eyes'

image_url.description: Public image URL for image-to-3D generation. When provided with action='generate', uses image-to-model instead of text-to-model.

task_id.description: Task ID returned from a generate action. Required for action='status' and action='download'.

format.description: Desired output 3D model format. Default: glb

model_version.description: Tripo model version. Default: v3.0-20250812 (best stable quality). Options: Turbo-v1.0 (fastest), v3.1 (newest, may be unstable), v2.5 (fast+balanced), v2.0 (accurate), v1.4 (legacy)

animation.description: Animation preset for action='animate'. Requires a rigged model (use action='rig' first).

block_size.description: Block size for stylization (action='stylize'). Larger = coarser blocks.

texture_quality.description: Texture quality for action='texture'. 'detailed' gives higher resolution.

spec.description: Rigging specification for action='rig'. 'mixamo' for Mixamo-compatible skeleton.
